name: multi_image_transformation
description: Multi-Image Transformation Pipeline: 1-3 Input Images + Context → Direct to Stage 3/4 (No Interception)

prompt_structure.description: Multiple images (1-3) + context prompt (no interception, direct to optimization)

meta.notes: Multi-image fusion flow: Upload 1-3 images → Context prompt → Media selection (qwen_2511_multi) → Stage 3 optimization → Stage 4 generation. Uses TextEncodeQwenImageEditPlus for multi-image conditioning. Image 2 and 3 are optional. No Stage2 interception for direct experience.
